name: Block-Spot
description:
Block Spot is an easy to pick up gyroscope based arcade game for Android. Your goal is to position the current block in the correct position and rotation so that it lines up with the corresponding shape on the approaching wall.

Use the gyroscope to move the shape, and swipe the sides of the screen to rotate. Double tap for a speed boost and double points.

More points are awarded based on your accuracy and the number of successful hits you have made in a row.

Go for the high score!
